name: places/ChIJGXde-3v2wokRPKMWXyyNpbU
formattedAddress: 300 W 145th St, New York, NY 10039, USA
adrFormatAddress: 300 W 145th St, New York, NY 10039, USA

editorialSummary.text: Supermarket chain selling groceries, baked goods & frozen foods, plus health & beauty products.

originalText.text: This place is another level- it might as well be in SoHo with the prices and selection they have. Adding in the cast of characters in this place you might as well order from Fresh Direct. You could have groceries delivered by the time you check out in this place!  There's guaranteed to be an altercation or mental breakdown happening at the register at any given time! Its also like a maze so once you're in deep good luck finding your way back out!

text.text: This place is another level- it might as well be in SoHo with the prices and selection they have. Adding in the cast of characters in this place you might as well order from Fresh Direct. You could have groceries delivered by the time you check out in this place!  There's guaranteed to be an altercation or mental breakdown happening at the register at any given time! Its also like a maze so once you're in deep good luck finding your way back out!

originalText.text:
I've been shopping here for quite some time, contributing thousands of dollars, and I was recently shown that my loyalty to this company meant little to nothing.

I returned to the store about a day after a representative from customer service informed me that I may make an exchange for the correct coffee creamer that I purchased after I admitted to opening the product.

The day I returned, I spoke with a different sales representative who eventually directed me to the manager, Felix. Felix told her to tell me (even though I was standing right there) that he would not allow me to exchange the item because it was opened. Faithfully, the representative echoed his words and walked away.

I approached Felix and asked if he may grant me this one-time exception, reasoning that I've been a faithful customer, have invested plenty of money into the establishment, had no intent on cheating the company, and that if anyone can bear the burden of waste, it would be Foodtown, based on my patronage.

Without recognizing my loyalty to the company, Felix subjected me to a crude interrogation seeking to undermine me. I couldn't help but feel as though Felix's condescending tone and his presumption that I was a crook stemmed from racial microaggressions. I was met with disregard, disrespect, and disappointment, and after being interrogated and having my card scanned to determine my customer-spending / loyalty card level, I was permitted to make the exchange.

No one should have to go through the process I went through. My faith in this company dropped exponentially, and a warning to all patrons of this store: Seemingly, we are simply a financial resource, our "customer loyalty cards" are a means to get us to spend more on already over-priced items, and the moment you cost the company a few dollars, they will shun you away.

Further, most of the cashiers are ill-mannered, unprofessional, and always sizing people up.

This not an establishment worthy of longevity.

originalText.text: I love this supermarket. Fresh fruits, vegetables, meats and seafood. There's a little bakery with fresh bread, pastries and goodies to satisfy your craving. Don't forget to get a club card for the awesome savings.

text.text: I love this supermarket. Fresh fruits, vegetables, meats and seafood. There's a little bakery with fresh bread, pastries and goodies to satisfy your craving. Don't forget to get a club card for the awesome savings.

originalText.text: I personally love shopping here. I love the deals/sales. Cool atmosphere. I haven't ever had a problem with staff. The supermarket is always clean & the food is always fresh.

text.text: I personally love shopping here. I love the deals/sales. Cool atmosphere. I haven't ever had a problem with staff. The supermarket is always clean & the food is always fresh.

originalText.text: This supermarket is appalling & ran by a joke of staff. Every-time, I have shopped here and checked out items rang up for the incorrect price and this is outside of a sale price! Then, a cashier will proceed to bicker about the pricing. Instead of just confirming and selling it for the advertised price. It’s truly disgusting, how these employees handle customers. Secondly, every time I pay cash here, I am shorted. Specifically by Delmarr! A complete and utter thief. It’s no coincidence because It’s happened on multiple occasions. This place needs a clean up ASAP! However, I won’t be shopping here anymore. Thanks for NOTHING!
